title: "EU AI rules “should not constitute a regulatory straightjacket”"
excerpt: "Europe, on one hand, could be well-placed to remain a competitor. “You have Europe; we have trust, ethics and so on, and you can compare it with China, where AI [is used] to control 1.3bn citizens. Then you have the US with a more liberal approach to AI."
